meanings.sent1: She fubbed the fragile vase, causing it to fall and break.
meanings.sent2: He always fubbed up when trying to juggle the balls.
meanings.sent3: The magician fubbed his card trick, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her attempts to bake a cake were fubbed up like a puzzle missing a piece.
meanings.sent5: The toddler fubbed the puzzle pieces together, creating a mismatched picture.

meanings.sent1: The chef fubbed the recipe by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent2: He tends to fub up simple tasks by overthinking them.
meanings.sent3: The comedian fubbed his joke delivery, making the audience groan.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to fix the leaky faucet only fubbed the problem further.
meanings.sent5: The student fubbed the math problem, getting the answer completely wrong.

meanings.sent1: The scammer fubbed the old lady out of her life savings.
meanings.sent2: He tried to fub his way out of taking responsibility for the mistake.
meanings.sent3: The con artist fubbed his partner in the card game, winning unfairly.
meanings.sent4: Her smooth words fubbed him into believing her false promises.
meanings.sent5: The dishonest salesman fubbed the customers into buying unnecessary products.
